title: She Needs A Shot But Not By Cupid
itunes:title: She Needs A Shot But Not By Cupid
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a married man and I work a few part- time jobs. I make really good money, so my line of work has never been an issue in my marriage. I work as a modern-day gigolo and I mostly get paid to entertain women at corporate events, dinners and family functions. I also have a few older ladies that call me if they need a tune-up, if you know what I mean. I get paid well for that, but I don’t do it often. My wife doesn’t know about that part of my job..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a married man and I work a few part- time jobs. I make really good money, so my line of work has never been an issue in my marriage. I work as a modern-day gigolo and I mostly get paid to entertain women at corporate events, dinners and family functions. I also have a few older ladies that call me if they need a tune-up, if you know what I mean. I get paid well for that, but I don’t do it often. My wife doesn’t know about that part of my job..................
